summary: Improve the appearance and skills of the vanilla follower Adelaisa Vendicci in Windhelm.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][b][i][color=#ffff00]Skyrim SE version nowÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2999]available[/url][/color][/i]
[/b]
[u]Description[/u][/b][/size]
[url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Adelaisa_Vendicci]Adelaisa Vendicci[/url] is an Imperial in the vanilla game that works for the East Empire company in Windhelm, and can become a follower. She is apparently a former Imperial soldier, wearing Imperial heavy armor.

However, she has an odd, somewhat useless set of skills (she is not skilled in the heavy armor she wears, for example) and a face that looks like she's been on a 2-week skooma bender. I'm fine having older NPC followers, but I wanted her rough looks to appear as though she's been battle-hardened from years of service as a soldier, not like she's strung out or sickly. This mod changes that.


[size=4][b][color=red]IMPORTANT!! SEE INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS BELOW!![/color][/b][/size]


[size=4][b][u]Features[/u][/b][/size]
[list]
[*]Marked Essential. (note: in an existing game, you may need to use UFO to set the essential flag, using the "You are important" dialogue option.)
[*]Female gender stance.
[*]Levels with the player from 5 to 100.
[*]Custom class and combat style.
[*]Perked in her particular skillsets (one-handed weapons (including dual-wield, archery,block,heavy armor, and of course, Lightfoot).
[*]Morality: Up to "Violence against enemies"
[*]Reviewed with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url].
[/list]

[size=4][b][u]Perks[/u][/b][/size]
[list]
[*]1H - Armsman60/Bladesman60/DualFlurry30/DualSavagery
[*]Archery - Overdraw20/CriticalShot60/Ranger
[*]Block - ShieldWall60/DeflectArrows/BlockRunner
[*]Heavy Armor - Juggernaut60/TowerofStrength
[*]Sneak - Lightfoot
[/list]

[size=4][b][u]Requirements[/u][/b][/size]
Vanilla Skyrim. No DLCs required.

[size=4][b][u]Versions[/u][/b][/size]
See "Latest Version" link above.

[size=4][b][u]Installation[/u][/b][/size]
If you are starting a new game:
[list]
[*]Download with NMM.
[*]Activate in NMM.
[/list]
For an existing game - [color=red]IMPORTANT[/color]:
[i]This is in case Adelaisa's skills/stats are not appropriately changed just by loading the mod.
(Use UFO or similar mod to verify her skills/stats are correct.)
If not, use the method below.[/i]
[list]
[*]Create a savegame.
[*]Download mod with NMM.
[*]Exit game and activate mod in NMM.
[*]Load the savegame.
[*]Open the console (tilde key) and click on Adelaisa. You should see her Form ID number appear.
[*]Type: [b]disable[/b] (this will cause Adelaisa to disappear - that's ok)
[*]Type: [b]enable[/b]
[*]Type: [b]setlevel 1000 0 5 100[/b]
[*]Exit the console (tilde key)
[*]Adelaisa should now reappear and her stats should be correct (you can check with UFO)
[/list]

[size=4][b][u]Removal[/u][/b][/size]
Dismiss the follower.
Deactivate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Usage[/u][/b][/size]
Do not upload this mod elsewhere, but feel free to use anything in it for your own mod.

[size=4][b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b][/size]
Load after UFO or any other mod which modifies Adelaisa.
Uses only vanilla assets.
Recommended mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19903]Follower Trade Priority[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18794/?]Challenging AI - Aggressive Combat Styles[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2700/?]Duel - Combat Realism[/url]

[size=4][b][u]Mods used in screenshots[/u][/b][/size]
I like a generally minimalistic approach to character visual changes. These are the mods I use which affect female appearance:
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510/?]Superior Lore-friendly Hair - HD Textures[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30/?]No More Blocky Faces[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?]Better Females By Bella[/url] (version: No makeup just improved textures)
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url]
[*]Imperial armor: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6085/?]Perfect Legionnaire[/url].
[/list]


[size=4][b][u]My Mods[/u][/b][/size][list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/774541/?tb=mods&pUp=1#]Skyrim Special Edition[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/774541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Skyrim[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/users/774541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Oblivion[/url]
[/list]
author: LazyAltmer
